title: Webfonts from Monokrom
content:
<iframe width="420" height="315" src="/web/20150421204407if_/http://www.youtube.com/embed/apDYVHpNgCs?rel=0" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

I’m happy to announced the Monokrom catalogue is now available for web use on [Webtype.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150421204407/http:/www.webtype.com/catalog/?foundry=96) (renting and self-hosting) and on [Monokrom.no](http://web.archive.org/web/20150421204407/https:/monokrom.no/) (self-hosting).

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150421204407im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Monokrom-banner_3506.png)
author: Frode Bo Helland

comments.content: Sorry about the huge image. Retina confusion.
